Objectstore Rest APIÂ¶

Overview

Resource Operation Description
ObjectStore POST /objectstores/(rse)/(operation) get signed urls.
ObjectStoreGet GET /objectstores/(url)/(rse)/(operation) get signed url.
ObjectStoreInfo POST /objectstores/(rse) Get files metadata at a given RSE.
ObjectStoreRename POST /objectstores/(rse) Rename object.

Details

GET /objectstores/(url)/(rse)/(operation)Â¶

Pass a url and return the signed url.

Parameters:
  • url â A URL string.
  • rse â RSE name.
  • operation â the request operation (default: âreadâ).
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid Auth Token.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Internal Error.
Returns:

the signed URL.

get redirect URL.

POST /objectstores/(rse)/(operation)Â¶

Get URLs for files at a given RSE.

Parameters:
  • rse â RSE name.
  • operation â the request operation (default: âreadâ).
Request JSON Object:
 
  • urls (string) â A list of URL strings.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/json
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 400 Bad Request â Cannot decode json parameter list.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid Auth Token.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Internal Error.
Returns:

Dictionary of Signed URLs.
POST /objectstores/(rse)Â¶

Pass list of urls and return their metadata.

Parameters:
  • rse â RSE name.
Request JSON Object:
 
  • urls (string) â A list of URL string.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/json
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 400 Bad Request â Cannot decode json parameter list.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid Auth Token.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Internal Error.
Returns:

Dictonary of metadata.
POST /objectstores/(rse)Â¶

Rename object.

Parameters:
  • rse â the RSE name.
Request JSON Object:
 
  • url (string) â the URL string.
  • new_url (string) â the new URL string.
  • urls (string) â A list of URL string.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/json
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 400 Bad Request â Cannot decode json parameter list.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid Auth Token.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Internal Error.
